the honeymoon is over

2003-07-30

I woke up this morning to another day of rain. Cold, wet, nasty stuff. I'm stuck in the office for eight hours a day for the whole summer break--three weeks--with about 5 hours of work total to get done. For the remainder of the time (one hundred fifteen hours) I have to figure out how to entertain myself... There is Japanese study, that can take half of my time if I am feeling especially majime. Email... I could do that for an hour a day. And there is always internet nerding out, but I did that Mon and Tue and am about done with that. I set up a moblog within my photogallery that I can post to from my new phone, and figured out how to show the three latest thumbnails here on the lj. But I need to do something more productive. More productive than a few kb in etherspace that nobody will ever look at. Rrr.
